name: Legionfarm
headline: We connect gamers with training and assistance from Pro players
description:
LegionFarm lets gamers pay to play with professional players, helping customers have more fun playing, learn to be a better gamer, and conquer difficult parts of video games.

Legionfarm Pros want to monetize their skills by turning their hobbies into real careers. They are the top 1% of players. They have a massive impact on the success of gaming companies - and we want to allow these top players to hold their dream jobs in virtual worlds.

Over the past year, Legionfarm organized over 400,000 gaming sessions with our 7,000 Pros.

Legionfarm provides access to unique entertainment on a global scale while creating new jobs in virtual worlds at the same time

founders.name: Aleksei Beliankin-Bauer, Founder
founders.description: I'm a serial entrepreneur. Founder & Board member at Legionfarm (YC W20). Stepped down as a CEO of Legionfarm earlier in 2024. Over 150k customers have used our two web marketplaces and five messenger bots to hire pro players in video games. The company is now breakeven, having reduced from 140 employees to 18. We replaced 74 customer service roles with LLMs and began full CS automation in March 2023. I have strong experience in enhancing CS in marketplaces with AI agents

## Want to Level Up in Call of Duty? Let's Make it Happen with Our CoD Coaching Services!
You've been grinding Call of Duty for what feels like forever—yet the wins aren't stacking up, and your kill/death ratio isn't exactly where you want it. Sound familiar? Whether you're struggling to climb the leaderboard in Warzone or feeling lost in the chaos of Modern Warfare, our Call of Duty boosting service is here to make your journey easier. We're not talking about cookie-cutter advice but tailored sessions that show you the ropes while boosting your stats. Want to feel like a real operator on the battlefield? You're in the right place.
## How Can Call of Duty Boosting Make You a Better Player?
Let's get real. Call of Duty is no walk in the park. Whether it's the mind-bending map complexity in Warzone or the nail-biting intensity of the Gulag, leveling up in this game requires more than luck. But here's the kicker—sometimes, knowing the mechanics isn't enough. You need real, actionable tips to climb the ranks. That's where CoD Coaching Services come in.
We're here to boost your performance, whether you need a win boost, weapon leveling, or camo boosting to make those loadouts unstoppable.
Here's what you get when you team up with our pros:
  * Weapon Mastery: Learn how to handle every gun in the game. From assault rifles to snipers, our CoD boosters will help you find your signature weapon.
  * Map Awareness: Tired of getting ambushed? Our coaches will show you how to navigate like a pro—whether it's knowing the best sniper spots or mastering close-quarters combat.
  * Strategy Optimization: You'll learn when to rush, when to hang back, and how to manage your Scorestreaks and Perks effectively.


With personalized coaching, you won't just play the game—you'll dominate it. Say goodbye to frustrating losses and hello to a higher kill/death ratio and better squad coordination.
## Why Choose Legionfarm for Your Call of Duty Boost?
Why should you trust Legionfarm for your next Call of Duty boost? Simple. We've cracked the code on delivering coaching and boosting services that get results, fast. When you sign up with us, you're not just getting another CoD booster—you're gaining a battle-hardened ally dedicated to your success.
Here's what makes our Call of Duty boosting stand out:
  * Elite Coaches: Our team consists of top-tier pros with thousands of hours of experience. They know the maps, the tactics, and the mechanics better than anyone.
  * Customizable Sessions: Whether you need a Battle Pass boost or tips on weapon leveling, we tailor our sessions to your needs. No cookie-cutter solutions, just results that work.
  * 100% Safe and Secure: Your account's safety is our top priority. We use secure methods to ensure your boost is hassle-free and risk-free.
  * Rapid Results: Want to see immediate improvement? Our CoD boosting service guarantees a noticeable boost in your performance in as little as one session.


Ready to turn your gaming frustration into glory? With Legionfarm's Call of Duty Coaching and carry services, victory is just a session away.

generated_description:
**Legionfarm: Connecting Gamers with Pros**

Legionfarm is a trailblazer in the gaming industry, marrying the thrill of gameplay with opportunities for improvement through professional coaching. Their mission? To link gamers with top-tier players who offer the training and assistance needed to enhance the gaming experience. Founded in 2020 as part of Y Combinator’s W20 batch and anchored in San Francisco, the company has grown swiftly, organizing over 400,000 gaming sessions with around 7,000 elite professionals.

### What They Do

Initially, Legionfarm offered a platform for gamers to pay to play alongside professionals, making it more enjoyable to tackle challenging sections of games. This model has evolved into a robust service that not only enhances gameplay but also empowers exceptional players—the top 1%—to monetize their skills. These players can now pursue careers in the virtual realm while positively impacting the gaming industry's success.

### Services Offered

Legionfarm excels in offering personalized coaching and boosting services for popular titles like Call of Duty. Whether you need to improve your kill/death ratio, master weapon handling, or hone strategic skills, Legionfarm provides a tailored experience. Their coaching sessions are not just about generic advice; they focus on actionable insights that can significantly accelerate your progress in the game.

### Why Choose Legionfarm?

1. **Elite Coaches**: Legionfarm boasts a team of the best players available, each with extensive experience. They know the ins and outs of the games and can provide targeted advice that leads to real improvements.
   
2. **Customizable Sessions**: Recognizing that each gamer has unique needs, Legionfarm tailors its coaching sessions to fit those, ensuring that every player gets exactly what they require to advance.
   
3. **Safety First**: They prioritize the security of your gaming account, employing secure methods to ensure a hassle-free experience.
   
4. **Rapid Results**: Many users report noticeable improvements after just one session, making Legionfarm a swift path to success in your favorite games.

### The Bigger Picture

Legionfarm isn’t just about boosting individual scores; it’s about creating jobs in the gaming industry and enhancing the overall entertainment landscape globally. With a dedicated team of 75 employees working to connect gamers and pros, Legionfarm is standing at the forefront of the gaming evolution, making experiences richer and more rewarding for everyone involved.

If you're looking to turn frustration into triumph in your gaming endeavors, checking out Legionfarm’s offerings could be the game-changer you need. You can explore more about their services on their website: [Legionfarm](https://legionfarm.com/).
